price: Anaasε wͻn afri Nyankopͻn akyi afa ntwitwagyefoͻ bi? (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Sε (wͻn ntwitwagyefoͻ no) nni hwee ho tumi, na wͻnni adwene mpo a?”
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi shufaʿāa qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shayan walā yaʿqilūna
